Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Division and Central due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Division and Central, due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Westbound Reroute near Devon/Paulina
ShortDescription: Westbound 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Pratt, Ridge,  and Devon due to construction near Devon/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Pratt, Ridge, and Devon, then resume their normal route on Devon.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on Devon/Paulina.

Headline: #36 Broadway and #151 Sheridan Temporary Westbound Reroute near Devon/Paulina
ShortDescription: Westbound 36 Broadway and 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Ashland, Foster and into the garage due to construction near Devon/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #36 Broadway and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Ashland, Foster and into the garage due to construction near Devon/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/LaSalle
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses rerouted EB via 35th, Wentworth, Root, State, & Pershing; WB via Pershing, State, 35th & LaSalle due to street blockage near Pershing/LaSalle

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Pershing/LaSalle.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Wentworth, Root, State, and Pershing.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Pershing, State, 35th and LaSalle, then resume their normal route on Pershing.

Allow extra travel time.
